title: Dr1.0
body: Care for a few holes? [[Answer:Player1.0a|Player1.0a]] [[Answer:Player1.2a|Player1.2a]]

title: Player1.0a
body: I am in a bit of a hurry, old chap<cngVar>talkingAboutBody 01</cngVar>

title: Player1.2a
body: <reqVar>wolfSuspect 1</reqVar>Actually, the only hole I wanted to discuss was the hole in John Doe. [[Answer:Frankenstein1.2b|Frankenstein1.2b]]<cngVar>talkingAboutBody 10</cngVar>

title: Frankenstein1.2b
body: Yes, nasty business, that. Any luck catching them killers, then? [[Answer:Player1.2End|Player1.2End]] [[Answer:Player1.3a|Player1.3a]]

title: Player1.2End
body: No, unfortunately, no leads so far.

title: Player1.3a
body: <reqVar>hasBlood 1</reqVar>You know, I did find something that may be helpul. [[Answer:Player1.3b|Player1.3b]]

title: Player1.3b
body: This blood was found some ways away from the body. It probably came from the killer. [[Answer:Node|Dr1.3b]]

title: Dr1.3b
body: That's quite incriminating, if you knew whose blood. [[Answer:Player1.3End|Player1.3End]] [[Answer:Player1.4a|Player1.4a]]

title: Player1.3End
body: Yes, you're right. I'll come back when I have more.

title: Player1.4a
body: <reqVar>hasBusinessCard 1</reqVar>I am absolutely sure that Jon Wolfington handled this, and that he's the killer. [[Answer:Player1.4b|Player1.4b]]

title: Player1.4b
body: It even has his blood on it. [[Answer:Dr.1.4c|Dr.1.4c]]

title: Dr.1.4c
body: There's an easy way to tell if he handled this. [[Answer:Dr1.4d|Dr1.4d]]

title: Dr1.4d
body: He had a DUI some years back, so his prints are just on final. Shh about me doing this, by the way. [[Answer:Player1.4e|Player1.4e]]

title: Player1.4e
body: *Hands over note* [[Answer:Node|Dr1.4f]]

title: Dr1.4f
body: Oh, he definitely handled this. This is without a doubt his blood. What else do you have for me? [[Answer:Node|Player1.4End]] [[Answer:Player1.5a|Player1.5a]]

title: Player1.4End
body: That's it, unfortunately.

title: Player1.5a
body: <reqVar>hasPicture 1</reqVar>There's this picture that shows him clearly covered in blood. [[Answer:Node|Player1.5b]] [[Answer:Player1.5End|Player1.5End]]

title: Player1.5b
body: I should go collect more evidence. [[Answer:Dr1.5b|Dr1.5b]]

title: Dr1.5b
body: Did you try looking by the Wolfington Marina? [[Answer:Dr1.5c|Dr1.5c]]

title: Dr1.5c
body: Or maybe speak to the au pair, who should be hiding in Ramsett Park [[Answer:DrEnd|DrEnd]]

title: DrEnd
body: Best of luck to you, bringing justice to the world

title: Player1.5End
body: I think I have enough evidence to bring this sick bastard down.<cngVar>startBoss 10</cngVar>
